programme.title: Masti
programme.desc: Three henpecked friends tired of their respective marriage decide to spice up their lives by indulging in an extramarital affair. But things go downhill very quickly when they become the prime suspects in a deadly murder case.

programme.title: Deewaar: Let's Bring Our Heroes Home
programme.desc: A group of Indian POW (Prisoners of War) from the 1971 Indo-Pak war rebels against the Pakistani army and tries to escape from their captivity. Helping the group in the mission is Gaurav, the son of a former Army Major also held captive by the enemy.

programme.title: Dhamaal
programme.desc: Four slack and vagabond conmen learn about a hidden treasure from a dying thief and race against time to claim it. Meanwhile, they are also being pursued by a determined police inspector who is hell-bent on finding the treasure and keeping it all to himself.

programme.title: Baatein Kahi Ankahi
programme.desc: Watch Baatein Kahi Ankahi with RJ Anmol In An Exclusive Interview With Bollywood Stars.

programme.title: Mandi
programme.desc: In order to acquire the prime location of a brothel, greedy politicians preach lessons of morality in their attempts to take it down. The politicians' proposition to relocate is not feasible for the coureasans. Will they comply or fight back?

programme.title: 3_Deewarein
programme.desc: A documentary filmmaker Chandrika soughts to capture the prison life of three men sentenced to death. Initially hesitant in trusting Chandrika, the men eventually open up and share their stories with her, which leads to some shocking revelations.

programme.title: Encounter: The Killing
programme.desc: After accidentally shooting a young mobster, a guilt-stricken police officer sets off to search for the parents who never came forward to claim their son's body.

programme.title: Raja Hindustani
programme.desc: A young taxi driver and a rich city girl fall head over heels in love with each other. Defying her family, she marries him and relocates to his village. But her family weaves a web of deception to split them apart.

programme.title: Golmaal: Fun Unlimited
programme.desc: The story revolves around the lives of four guys named Gopal, Lucky, Madhav, and Laxman who all absurdly fall for the same girl. Hence, begins the hilarious race to win her heart.
